page.title: 04DURLEY ESTATE, PRENTON
page.content: The{North Cheshire Trading Estate is situated near junction 3 of the M53 motorway in Prenton. Fifteen companies are trading on the estate at present, selling {products}such as polythene covers, medicines and blouses, to name but a few. Most manufacturers sell to other companies, some exporting as far afield as the{U.S.A.}and{Saudi Arabia. The district offices of{Merseyside {and North Wales Electricity Board}and {North West Water Authority}are also there, employing 230 men and women. There are approximately 1000 people employed in the factories; most of the employees are men. Many of the companies have been trading for several years, Newman and Pugh, which has been trading for 17 years, being the longest.
